channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 5:28 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 5:28 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:28 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 17:28 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region.
